name: MediaGenie
description: Enterprise-grade multimedia content intelligent management SaaS platform with AI-powered speech-to-text, text-to-speech, image analysis, and GPT chat capabilities.
longDescription:
MediaGenie is a comprehensive multimedia content intelligent management platform designed for content production companies, online education providers, and customer service centers. Built on Azure's powerful AI services, it provides seamless integration of speech recognition, text-to-speech synthesis, computer vision, and conversational AI capabilities.

Key Features:
• Speech-to-Text: Convert audio files to text with high accuracy
• Text-to-Speech: Generate natural-sounding speech from text
• Image Analysis: Extract text, detect objects, and analyze image content
• GPT Chat: Intelligent conversational AI for content assistance
• Multi-language Support: Support for Chinese, English, Japanese, and more
• Enterprise Security: Built-in security and compliance features
• Scalable Architecture: Microservices-based architecture for high availability
• Real-time Processing: Fast processing with real-time status updates
